titleStmt.title: The vvelspring of wittie conceites containing, a methode, asvvell to speake, as to endight (aptly and eloquently of sundrie matters: as (also) see great varietie of pithy sentences, vertuous sayings, and right morall instructions ... Out of Italian, by W. Phist. student.
titleStmt.author: Phiston, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Iones: dwelling at the signe of the Rose and the Crowne, neere Holburne Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The vvelspring of wittie conceightes.
Identified as STC 10925 on UMI microfilm reel 226.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 204 and at reel 226 (same copy filmed twice).
